# Project Management Skill

## Description
This skill is designed to manage all aspects of the project hosted on GitHub. The repository for this project is located at [glr-stagemarkt-clone](https://github.com/devbyray/glr-stagemarkt-clone).

## Features
- **Issue Tracking**: Manage and track issues directly on the GitHub repository.
- **Pull Requests**: Handle code reviews and pull request workflows.
- **Project Boards**: Organize tasks and track progress using GitHub Project Boards.
- **Milestones**: Set and manage milestones to track project goals.
- **Collaboration**: Facilitate team collaboration through GitHub's built-in tools.

## Usage
1. Navigate to the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/devbyray/glr-stagemarkt-clone).
2. Use the Issues tab to create, assign, and track issues.
3. Use the Pull Requests tab to review and merge code changes.
4. Utilize the Project Boards for task management and progress tracking.
5. Set milestones to define and monitor project goals.
6. Collaborate with team members using comments, mentions, and reviews.

## Prerequisites
- A GitHub account with access to the repository.
- Familiarity with GitHub workflows and tools.

## Additional Resources
- [GitHub Documentation](https://docs.github.com/)
- [GitHub Project Boards](https://docs.github.com/en/issues/organizing-your-work-with-project-boards)
- [GitHub Issues](https://docs.github.com/en/issues)
- [GitHub Pull Requests](https://docs.github.com/en/pull-requests)
